Text: Ozumba:  The entrance to the cloister area contains murals related to the early evangelization efforts of this order.
Triplets:<Ozumba
3:
--------------------
Text: Ozumba:  They include scenes such as Hernán Cortés greeting the first Franciscan missionaries in Mexico, the martyrdom of some of the first young converts to Christianity and even a scene where the monks are flogging Cortés.
Triplets:<Ozumba
5:
--------------------
<Text: Ozumba:  The name Ozumba comes from Nahuatl meaning “over the streams of water”.>
Triplets:<Ozumba
